name: The Small Scarsdale Console
description: A mesmerising statement of unique contemporary furniture design, the small scarsdale console is sure to give the wow factor to any stylish residence, hotel or superyacht. Designed with an eye-catching sculptural silhouette, this console is testament to the artistic design capabilities of Davidson. The Scarsdale has been featured in numerous publications as an icon of British design. The rectangular tabletop stands on a unique pedestal formed of three arcs, with a defiant central cylinder. The pedestal is available in any of Davidson's luxury timbers in high gloss or satin, in a variety of sizes that have been designed to perfect proportion.
